mapper.select:
select ifnull(sum(in_flows+out_flows), 0) as wholeFlows from ( select ifnull(in_flows,0) as in_flows, ifnull(out_flows,0) as out_flows from (
(select name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t1 left join
(select name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t2 on t1.id = t2.id ) union select ifnull(in_flows,0) as in_flows, ifnull(out_flows,0) as out_flows from (
(select name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t1 right join
(select name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t2 on t1.id = t2.id ) ) t

select ifnull(sum(in_flows+out_flows), 0) as wholeFlows, ifnull(sum(in_packages+out_packages), 0) as wholePackets, ifnull(sum(connectIn+connectOut), 0) as wholeConnects from ( select ifnull(in_flows,0) as in_flows, ifnull(out_flows,0) as out_flows, ifnull(in_packages, 0) as in_packages, ifnull(out_packages, 0) as out_packages, ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectOut from (
(select name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages, sum(connectOut) as connectOut from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows, sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages,sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t1 left join
(select name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages, sum(connectIn) as connectIn from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t2 on t1.id = t2.id ) union select ifnull(in_flows,0) as in_flows, ifnull(out_flows,0) as out_flows, ifnull(in_packages, 0) as in_packages, ifnull(out_packages, 0) as out_packages, ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectOut from (
(select name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages, sum(connectOut) as connectOut from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t1 right join
(select name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages, sum(connectIn) as connectIn from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp&1<<(g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${stime} and f.acq_time <= ${etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t2 on t1.id = t2.id ) ) t

select * from ( select name, ipGroupId,
flowIn, flowOut, flowIn+flowOut as flowTotal, flowIn/${condition.timeInterval} as speedIn, flowOut/${condition.timeInterval} as speedOut, (flowIn + flowOut) / ${condition.timeInterval} as speedTotal,
packetIn, packetOut, packetIn+packetOut as packetTotal, packetIn/${condition.timeInterval} as packetInSpeed, packetOut/${condition.timeInterval} as packetOutSpeed, (packetIn+packetOut)/${condition.timeInterval} as packetTotalSpeed,
connectIn as connectNumberIn, connectOut as connectNumberOut, (connectIn+connectOut) as connectNumberTotal, connectIn/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberInSpeed, connectOut/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberOutSpeed, (connectIn+connectOut)/${condition.timeInterval} as connectNumberTotalSpeed,
(flowIn+flowOut)/${condition.wholeFlows} as flowPctge, (packetIn+packetOut)/${condition.wholePackets} as packetPctge, (connectIn+connectOut)/${condition.wholeConnects} as connectPctge from ( select t1.name, t1.id as ipGroupId,
ifnull(in_flows,0) as flowIn, ifnull(out_flows,0) as flowOut, ifnull(in_packages,0) as packetIn, ifnull(out_packages,0) as packetOut, ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectOut from ( (select name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages, sum(connectOut) as connectOut from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t1 left join
(select name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages, sum(connectIn) as connectIn from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t2 on t1.id = t2.id ) union select t2.name,
t2.id as ipGroupId, ifnull(in_flows,0) as flowIn, ifnull(out_flows,0) as flowOut, ifnull(in_packages,0) as packetIn, ifnull(out_packages,0) as packetOut, ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectOut from ( ( select name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages, sum(connectOut) as connectOut from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t1 right join ( select name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages, sum(connectIn) as connectIn from ( select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id union select g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${condition.tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${condition.ifId}) and f.acq_time > ${condition.stime} and f.acq_time <= ${condition.etime} group by g.id ) t1 group by id )t2 on t1.id = t2.id ) ) t group by t.name ) tall
order by tall.${condition.sort} ${condition.order}

select * FROM ( select acq_time, name, ipGroupId,
flowIn, flowOut, flowIn+flowOut as flowTotal, flowIn/${timeInterval} as speedIn, flowOut/${timeInterval} as speedOut, (flowIn+flowOut)/${timeInterval} as speedTotal,
packetIn, packetOut, packetIn+packetOut as packetTotal, packetIn / ${timeInterval} as packetInSpeed, packetOut / ${timeInterval} as packetOutSpeed, (packetIn+packetOut) / ${timeInterval} as packetTotalSpeed,
connectIn as connectNumberIn, connectOut as connectNumberOut, (connectIn+connectOut) as connectNumberTotal, connectIn / ${timeInterval} as connectNumberInSpeed, connectOut / ${timeInterval} as connectNumberOutSpeed, (connectIn+connectOut) / ${timeInterval} as connectNumberTotalSpeed,
(flowIn+flowOut) / ${wholeFlows} as flowPctge, (packetIn+packetOut) / ${wholePackets} as packetPctge, (connectIn+connectOut) / ${wholeConnects} as connectPctge from ( select t1.acq_time, t1.name,t1.id as ipGroupId, ifnull(in_flows,0) as flowIn, ifnull(in_packages,0) as packetIn, ifnull(out_flows,0) as flowOut,ifnull(out_packages,0) as packetOut, ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectOut from (
(select acq_time,name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages,sum(connectOut) as connectOut from ( select g.name,f.acq_time,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time union select g.name,f.acq_time,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time ) t1 group by acq_time )t1 left join (select acq_time,name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages, sum(connectIn) as connectIn from ( select f.acq_time,g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time union select f.acq_time,g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time ) t1 group by acq_time )t2 on t1.acq_time = t2.acq_time ) union select t2.acq_time, t2.name,t2.id as ipGroupId,ifnull(in_flows,0) as flowIn,ifnull(in_packages,0) as packetIn, ifnull(out_flows,0) as flowOut,ifnull(out_packages,0) as packetOut, ifnull(connectIn, 0) as connectIn, ifnull(connectOut, 0) as connectOut from (
(select acq_time,name,id, sum(out_flows) as out_flows,sum(out_packages) as out_packages, sum(connectOut) as connectOut from ( select f.acq_time,g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time union select f.acq_time,g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as out_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as out_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectOut from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.src_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time ) t1 group by acq_time )t1 right join
(select acq_time,name,id, sum(in_flows) as in_flows,sum(in_packages) as in_packages, sum(connectIn) as connectIn from ( select f.acq_time,g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_IN_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_in_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time union select f.acq_time,g.name,g.id,sum(f.octets_total) as in_flows,sum(f.packet_total) as in_packages, sum(f.flow_total) as connectIn from CONF_IP_GROUP g left join CONF_IP_GROUP_AID a on g.id = a.conf_ip_group_id left join ANA_IF_OUT_NET_APP_TOS_${tableSuffix} f on f.dst_ip_grp & 1 << (g.id - 1)!=0 where f.acq_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) and if_out_id in (${ifId}) and f.acq_time in (${timeParam}) and g.id = ${ipGroupId} group by f.acq_time ) t1 group by acq_time )t2 on t1.acq_time = t2.acq_time ) ) t group by t.acq_time ) tall
